org.lightningj.paywall.spring

Class APIError

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.JSONParsable
      • org.lightningj.paywall.spring.APIError

  • public class APIError
extends JSONParsable
    Value object class used to generate API error message when returning either JSON or XML.
